title: Drawing, "Project for bible marker", 1925–35
inscribed:
Center: beginning of an inscription: IN LOVING MEMORY. 
The customer marked the right pendant and wrote on reverse: In general, please more body / to the hangers. All else is fine. Thank
description: Three pendants on ribbons, ovoids in pierced work, containing: A.[Greek letter omega], at left; a cross, center; an anchor, at right.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for bible marker", 1925–35.Pencil, watercolor, cardboard. 1939-84-35-b.
